Articles.Content:
So i was flying to dres, made a landing there then to find out there was an easter egg right over the hill. I've searched it on the ksp wiki and there is no record of it being discovered yet? the location is 21,8,1N 157,33,30W.

I'll try to post some pictures or a link to them, anybody else who has discovered this anomaly?

link: http://imgur.com/a/DDr02

Edited October 28, 2013 by panzerknoef
Whack-a-kerbal. That's what I believe it's. But I would like dres to be filled with anomalies (I.e 15)
lol okay thx, don't remeber using whack-a-kerbal though
Okay just tested whack-a-kerbal and it is indeed what i saw before on dres
You could probably check if you have them in debris list in tracking station.

Noob question how does one use whack a kerbal I know its in the debug console but me know not how to use. (hee broken English)

Also what shall we call them if they are a new anomaly!

the pills of dres!

...

Also what shall we call them if they are a new anomaly!

the pills of dres!

Kraken eggs

Noob question how does one use whack a kerbal I know its in the debug console but me know not how to use. (hee broken English)

in the debug menu, click 'show whack-a-kerbal' and then press your middle mouse button to fire

It's whack-a-kerbal.

I think it's a easter egg, or someone is messing with your computer.

Whatever the case, I'm going to head there with a probe.
Well anyway in case it isn't a anomaly i apologize to people who used their valuable time to check out something that might just not be there
